title: Little Alchemy 2: Complete Human Walkthrough + Recipes

steps.title: Combine Clay + Life to create Human.
steps.content: Combine Clay + Life to create Human. You can create life with or without Time , which is unlocked by discovering at least 100 elements. Here's the fastest way to create Human: With Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Primordial soup + Time = Life Clay + Life = Human Without Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial soup + Energy = Life Clay + Life = Human

steps.title: Combine Earth + Life to create Human.
steps.content: Combine Earth + Life to create Human. You'll need to combine a few of the base elements beforehand. [1] X Research source Here's the fastest way to create Human: Water + Earth = Mud Water + Air = Rain Earth + Rain = Plant Mud + Plant = Swamp Air + Fire = Energy Swamp + Energy = Life Earth + Life = Human

steps.title: You can make Human with different recipes.
steps.content: You can make Human with different recipes. This only applies to Little Alchemy 2. The recipes are as follows: Time + Animal = Human Time + Monkey = Human Tool + Animal = Human Tool + Monkey = Human
